short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the default new tab with an empty black page to help you stay focused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zero distraction while working -
Black New Tab Focus replaces the default new tab with an empty black page so you can focus on what you are working on without any digital clutter.
